description:
Getting the following exception when doing a image-list in novaclient running trunk (1137): 
2011-06-02 16:08:58,523 ERROR nova.api.openstack [-] Caught error: get_images_detailed() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filters'
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/openstack/__init__.py", line 60, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return req.get_response(self.application)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/request.py", line 919, in get_response
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     application, catch_exc_info=False)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/request.py", line 887, in call_application
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     app_iter = application(self.environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/routes/middleware.py", line 131, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     response = self.app(environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/dec.py", line 147, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     resp = self.call_func(req, *args, **self.kwargs)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/dec.py", line 208, in call_func
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return self.func(req, *args, **kwargs)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/openstack/wsgi.py", line 357, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     action_result = self.dispatch(request, action, action_args)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/openstack/wsgi.py", line 380, in dispatch
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return controller_method(req=request, **action_args)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/openstack/images.py", line 68, in detail
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     images = self._image_service.detail(context, filters)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/image/glance.py", line 77, in detail
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     image_metas = self.client.get_images_detailed(filters=filters)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE: TypeError: get_images_detailed() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filters'
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE: 

Appears to have been introduced in rev 1124 related to filtering of image queries.
title: get_images_detailed() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filters'

comments.content:
Getting the following exception when doing a image-list in novaclient running trunk (1137): 
2011-06-02 16:08:58,523 ERROR nova.api.openstack [-] Caught error: get_images_detailed() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filters'
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/api/openstack/__init__.py", line 60, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return req.get_response(self.application)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/request.py", line 919, in get_response
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     application, catch_exc_info=False)

(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     app_iter = application(self.environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/dec.py", line 159, in __call__
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)

(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     return resp(environ, start_response)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/webob/dec.py", line 147, in __call__

(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/image/glance.py", line 77, in detail
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE:     image_metas = self.client.get_images_detailed(filters=filters)
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE: TypeError: get_images_detailed() got an unexpected keyword argument 'filters'
(nova.api.openstack): TRACE: 

Appears to have been introduced in rev 1124 related to filtering of image queries.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~antonym

comments.content: This looks like an issue with your glance, not nova.  Do you have trunk of glance installed also?  It looks like your version of GlanceClient does not support filtering.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~throughnothing

comments.content:
Specifically, it seems you need a version of glance with at least revision 133:

http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~hudson-openstack/glance/trunk/revision/133

You can see the filter parameters added there.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~throughnothing

comments.content: Marked this invalid as me and Brian Waldon tested the filters using trunk of nova and glance today and all seems well.  Re-open if there are remaining issues.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~throughnothing
